TransactionStateContext.BuyingState: When users purchase tokens and 'buy' function is called.
TransactionStateContext.SellingState: When users sell tokens via the 'sell' function.

ExternalInteractions.BuyingTokens: Transfers ether from users to contract address when tokens are purchased.
ExternalInteractions.SellingTokens: Transfers ether from contract to user when tokens are sold, if balance allows.
